H0.text: In Greek mythology, how many heads does Cerberus, the dog who guards the entrance to Hades, usually have. 1

H1.text: In Greek mythology, how many heads does Cerberus, the dog who guards the entrance to Hades, usually have. 2

H2.text: In Greek mythology, how many heads does Cerberus, the dog who guards the entrance to Hades, usually have. 4

H3.text: In Greek mythology, how many heads does Cerberus, the dog who guards the entrance to Hades, usually have. 3

A4.text: later writers almost universally give Cerberus three heads

A5.text: In Attic vase painting Cerberus usually has two dog heads

A6.text: Cerberus, the three-headed guard dog of the underworld, ensured that all souls could enter but none could escape.
